games.battleship.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.battleship.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The class player represents a player of battleship game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(PlayerId id, java.lang.String name, Board board)
      Player is instantiated by providing its id, name and board object.
